name: Kamikaze Cube
description:
Once a cube named Kamikaze decided to discover a dungeon but when he entered the den he realised that it wasn't a dungeon at all - it was the HOUSE OF DETENTION. Our hero, Kamikaze is a seasoned one but even for him these hell-like traps turned out to be a great challenge.
Find the exit from this dungeon. Get your patience to die again and again.
Features:
- Hardcore
- Minimalistic graphics
- Achievements
- Decent soundtrack
- HARDDDDcooorree
